description: Wealth One is a unified platform for analyzing funds, allowing users to track and analyze their investments in Indian stocks and cryptocurrencies using AI-powered insights.

features.dashboard: Interactive dashboard to view overall portfolio performance and trends.
features.aiAssistant: Gemini-powered AI agent to provide personalized insights on user portfolio.
features.cryptoIntegration: Real-time cryptocurrency data via CoinDCX API.
features.stockIntegration: Indian stock market data via Upstox API.
features.portfolioAnalysis: Detailed breakdown of holdings, gains/losses, and risk insights.
features.userQueries: Users can ask portfolio-related questions and receive smart answers.
features.responsiveDesign: Fully responsive interface optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

promptFormatting.emphasis: Uses **bold** for key points and *italic* for emphasis
promptFormatting.responseStyle: Short, concise, and formatted for readability

aiAssistant.contextData: Portfolio details from a static or dynamic JSON file

upstox.purpose: Get Indian stock data, including price, volume, and trends

sampleUserQuery: Give a summary of my crypto holdings.
What is the total value of my investments today?
